title: A Green New Shine for a Tired Playbook
description:
"Climate the Movie" pivots from smoothly introducing doubt about climate science to bluntly concocting a grand, conspiratorial fallacy to explain why establishment elites have created this “climate scare.”

The post A Green New Shine for a Tired Playbook appeared first on DeSmog.

title: Activists Launch Their Own Investigation of  Mud Spill Near Pennsylvania LNG Pipeline
description:
A mud spill near the Mariner East LNG pipeline in Pennsylvania led local activists to conduct their own investigation fearing the spill may contain bentonite, which can be harmful to the environment.

The post Activists Launch Their Own Investigation of  Mud Spill Near Pennsylvania LNG Pipeline   appeared first on DeSmog.
